alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 17 at 12:45AM MST until February 17 at 1:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Westerly winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 60 mph. Gusts may reach 75 mph along the immediate eastern foothills of the Northern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera and Northern High Plains. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause isolated power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use caution if traveling, particularly if driving a high profile vehicle or hauling a light weight trailer.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains
